name: SouperTeam
description:
(Made for Mini Jam 38!)

Souper Team! is a game about finding ingredients and putting them into a big pan in (not) action packed 10 Levels!

The only problem is... that the red chef can only walk, and the blue chef can only jump. Luckily, the red chef can push the blue chef, and the blue chef can jump while the red chef stands on him, making it easier to reach objects and platforms.

Tips: 

- You can press the down button to restart the game.

- On one of the levels you need to push the blue chef to the right. Don't worry, the blue chef won't fall to the void.

- The engine I used has a bug that makes the red chef stop moving forward. If this happens, move backwards a few steps and then try to move forward.

Controls:

Left and Right arrow - Move the red chef

Up arrow - Make the blue chef jump (he jumps kinda high...)

Down arrow - Restart current level

By makalski
